column5: Julia Yates Semmes Branch Library and Commanche Lookout Park all 5 min walking distance, 5 min walk to bus lines into town 15-20 miles away, Rolling Oaks Mall 3 miles away. Simple spartan furniture, minimalist and unfinished concrete flooring through living, dining and bedrooms, tiled bathrooms and linoleum kitchen.
column8: Garden Home on the NE, RAFB nearby.
